name: linguacafe
description: LinguaCafe is an open-source language exchange platform where users can match with partners to practice languages. Provides chat, profile matching, and schedule support in an easy-to-run self-hosted web UI.
features: Language Exchange: Partner matching, Practice scheduling, Multi-language support. Connect with language learners.
Communication: Chat system, Profile management, Availability tracking. Coordinate language practice sessions.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Community control, Custom deployment. Run your own language exchange platform.
Partner Matching: Language preferences, Skill level matching, Interest alignment. Find compatible partners.
Scheduling: Calendar integration, Time zone support, Session reminders. Organize practice sessions.
Profile System: Language skills, Learning goals, Availability. Showcase your language journey.
Chat Features: Text messaging, Voice calls, Video support. Communicate flexibly.
Community Tools: Forums, Group sessions, Events. Build language learning community.
